name: Punchkick Interactive
overview:
Punchkick InteractiveÂ® is America’s first design firm to focus exclusively on full-service mobile marketing. We’re a team of experienced mobile strategists, designers, and developers who share a passion for creating engaging mobile user-experiences.

Punchkick’s award-winning text-message campaign management, mobile Web site design, custom mobile app development, and mobile-media planning solutions have strengthened consumer engagement for many of the world’s leading brands including Microsoft, Harley-Davidson, Pearson Education, Allstate Insurance Co., Marriott International, and more.

For additional information visit www.punchkickinteractive.com or call (800) 549-4104.
